 @Order(value=2)
 @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/ebay")
public class Ebay
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.springframework.boot.CommandLineRunner

      • advancedFindCharityItems

        @GET
 @PostMapping(value="/AdvancedFindCharityItems")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public com.ebay.queens.responses.charityitemresponse.CharityItemResponse advancedFindCharityItems(@QueryParam(value="charityId")
                                                                                                                                                                                                java.lang.String charityId)
                                                                                                                                                                                         throws java.io.IOException,
                                                                                                                                                                                                javax.xml.bind.JAXBException
        Represents an api to search for the nonprofit id which is then used to bring back all the charity items sold by that nonprofit
        Parameters:
        charityId - - charityId is a String input of numbers using the nonprofitid used to get information on the charity to obtain the external id to return a list of products
        Returns:
        CharityItemResponse object which is a JSON object containing a list of items which the charity sells
        Throws:
        JAXBException, - IOException
        java.io.IOException
        javax.xml.bind.JAXBException
